docs.lead_paragraph: HELP for the needy? Of course, you say; the government helps, the State helps, the city helps, we all help; that's why taxes are so high -- of course we must all do our part, and we are doing it.

headline.main: THESE NEEDIEST STILL WAIT FOR RESCUE; Here Are Stories of Those in Deepest Want in All the City, Whose Distress Neighborly Compassion Alone Can Relieve THESE NEEDIEST STILL WAIT TO BE RESCUED TWENTY-FOURTH ANNUAL APPEAL

docs.abstract: Lr on heavy and intricate burden
docs.snippet: HELP for the needy? Of course, you say; the government helps, the State helps, the city helps, we all help; that's why taxes are so high -- of course we must all do our part, and we are doing it.
